component.name: Xamarin.Mobile
component.summary: Xamarin.Mobile is a library that exposes a single set of APIs for accessing common mobile device functionality across iOS, Android and Windows platforms.

sample.name: Xamarin.Mobile Android Samples.
sample.summary: Android samples for the AddressBook, MediaPicker and Geolocator APIs.

sample.name: Xamarin.Mobile iOS Samples.
sample.summary: iOS samples for the AddressBook, MediaPicker and Geolocator APIs.

sample.name: Xamarin.Mobile Windows Phone 7.5 Samples.
sample.summary: Windows Phone 7 samples for the AddressBook, MediaPicker and Geolocator APIs.
